comments.title: India's Gig Workers Are Up in Arms, and Tech Firms Should Worry
comments.comment: Delivery drivers,  crucial to the country's burgeoning tech sector, are starting to push back harder for financial protections.

comments.title: TROUBLES: NEWSWEEK Engulfed in Legal Drama as Owners Sue Each Other...
comments.comment: Lawsuits from key players include allegations of falsified records, stolen trade secrets and reputational damage.

comments.title: Brad Pitt's Skirt Has a Business Agenda
comments.comment: In a tight attention economy, male movie stars are using unconventional red-carpet style to bring eyeballs, press and even box-office dollars their way

comments.title: Procter & Gamble Sounds a Warning After Strong Quarter
comments.comment: The consumer-products giant reported its biggest annual sales increase in 16 years, but said that consumers are starting to cut back.

comments.reader: Timothy Puko and Katy Stech Ferek
comments.title: Senate Climate Bill Is a Boon for Fossil Fuels
comments.comment: The $369 billion measure has tax incentives to spur clean energy, but also guarantees for oil and gas drilling in what Sen. Joe Manchin calls an “all-in energy policy.

comments.title: Intel Posts Sharp Drop in Sales, Issues Muted Outlook
comments.comment: The chip maker's results reflect a slump in personal-computer purchases after two years of strong pandemic-era demand.

comments.title: Roku Swings to Second-Quarter Loss on Slower Ad Spending
comments.comment: Shares dive after hours as the streaming-hardware company's results miss analyst expectations.

comments.title: Why You Should—or Shouldn't—Buy a Home Security Camera
comments.comment: Smart cameras from Ring, Nest, Arlo and others are useful, but you can protect your privacy and that of your neighbors by enabling encryption and other settings.

comments.title: U.S. Eyes Sanctions Against Global Network It Believes Is Shipping Iranian Oil
comments.comment: The U.S. believes a global network of companies has been helping Iran evade sanctions and export oil by blending it with Iraqi oil in ship-to-ship transfers at sea to hide its origins.

comments.title: Profits From NC Casino Go to Relatives of Politicians...
comments.comment: Relatives of U.S. Rep. Jim Clyburn and former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley got secret stakes in a company set to profit from a new tribal casino as it was seeking federal approval. Those involved deny any quid pro quo.

comments.title: Automation Tech Company UiPath Acquires AI Startup Re:infer
comments.comment: The deal comes as demand increases for software automation, which can take up the slack caused by hiring freezes or spending cuts

comments.title: The Gate
comments.comment: The deal comes as demand increases for software automation, which can take up the slack caused by hiring freezes or spending cuts
